scripts.upload: python increment_version.py && rm -rf dist/ botasaurus_requests/bin/hrequests-cgo-2.1-windows-4.0-amd64.dll botasaurus_requests/bin/CR_VERSIONS.json botasaurus_requests/bin/FF_VERSIONS.json botasaurus_requests.egg-info  && python setup.py sdist && pip install -e . && python -m twine upload dist/* --verbose
scripts.install: rm -rf dist/ botasaurus_requests.egg-info  && python setup.py sdist && pip install -e .
